page.title: 04INDUSTRY
page.content: Industry in this area consists of small industrial units.Most are situated on a large industrial estate at Bayton road,they make items that include nuts and bolts,metal mouldings,plumbing and heating equipment and chromed items.As well as two small engineering firms and a chemical cleaning plant,there is a quite large petrol storage depot.Away from the industrial estate,situated in the middle of a housing estate are more small units.One specialises in customising cars.There they produce about 24cars a year and it takes about 200men hours to build a new car.The cars range in cost from Â£16:000_Â£30:000 each.The only colours used for spraying the cars are red,black,white and silver.Twenty staff are employed there who on average work 39 hours a week.
